title: China Vows to Prevent Yuan’s Exchange Rate From ‘Overshooting’
description: China vowed to prevent the yuan’s exchange rate from overshooting, sending yet another clear signal of its intention to slow the currency’s appreciation.
content: China vowed to prevent the yuan’s exchange rate from overshooting, sending yet another clear signal of its intention to slow the currency’s appreciation.
